title: Princess and Witch -The spell of Fairy Cakes- Download
text: Download and play now to get 2 free '*All you can eat tickets'!*Can be used in the game to play this more efficiently.*Story*Once upon a time, there was a very adorable princess.The king was delighted of her birth and always gave her whatever she wanted.One day, he got sick but she was just being so selfishwithout knowing that fact.A lot of kings and nobles from other countries gave her tons of gifts every day to butter her up.Another day, a small patisserie was opened in the town,The shop got a lot of great reputations and became very popular in the twinkling of an eye.That story reached to the princess's ears and the witch living in the center of the forestThis is a fantasy fairly tale which stories with a spoiled princess and a witch passionate about her experiments crossing each other in the patisserie where the good looking patissier is working for.*Characters*The Princess - A bit spoiled but very honest and adorable girl.She can get whatever she wants.She likes sweets and little birds.The Witch - Hard working girl living in the center of the forest. She's been looking after a strayed wolf she found recently. Her teacher used to teach her but she's currently missing.Patissier - Working hard to make sweets in the small patissrie.His dream is to have a lot people try his sweets.He's very good looking as a matter of the fact.*Overview*Give sweets to both princess and witch to move on to the next stories.They will change their clothes when you move on to the next stories.Your choices determine the ending - You'll see the real ending if you complete all the endings!Go to the bonus stage if you want to move on to the next stories faster - share us on twitter or use 'All you can eat' tickets you initially have in hand to go to the bonus stage!Enjoy our fantasy view of the world where a goddess and magic exist and the princess and sweets light up the story like a fairy tale!!This is recommended for the people who like fairy tales like Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Alice in Wonderland, Snow White, Thumbelina, The Little Mermaid, Frozen, Sleeping Princess, Tangled, Hansel and Gretel, Princess Kaguya, Momotaro, as well as the Nordic, Greek, Western and Celtic mythology.
